sections.title: The Finite String Newsletter Announcements
paragraphs: ACL OFFICERS FOR 1988 President: Alan Biermann, Duke University Vice President: Candy Sidner, BBN Laboratories Secretary-Treasurer: Donald Walker, Bell Commu-
nications Research Executive Committee (1988-1990): Bruce Ballard,
AT&T Bell Laboratories Nominating Committee (1988-1990): William Mann,

PEOPLE ON THE MOVE I have, at rather short notice, accepted a job offer from the European Headquarters of "Automated Language Processing Systems" (ALPS in Cortaillod, Switzerland). My new address is as follows: Beat Buchmann, Automated Language Processing Systems, Route de Boudry 14, 2016 Cortaillod/NE Switzerland. Burghard Rieger moved from Aachen to a full professorship in CL at Trier: Prof. Dr. Burghard Rieger, FB II--Linguistische Datenverarbeitung (LDV/CL), Universitaet Trier, Postfach 38 25, D-5500 Trier, West Germany Our NEW Address is: Prof. Dr. Walther v, Hahn, University of Hamburg, Computer Science Department, Natural Language Systems Division (NatS), Bodenstedtstrasse 16, 1)--2000 Hamburg 50, Federal Republic of Germany Our telephone numbers and net addresses remain unchanged: Office +40-4123 3315 Walther v. Hahn +40-4123 4529 walther@fkihh.uucp; Claudius Pyka +40-4123 2573 claude@fkihh.uucp; Martin Schroeder +40-4123 2574 Martin@fkihh.uucp. 1987 28 June-
